articles.summary: Think of the Web as a digital territory with its own social contract. articles.title: Smart Glasses Help Train General-Purpose Robots
articles.summary: General-purpose robots are hard to train. The dream is to have a robot like the Jetson’s Rosie that can performing a range of household tasks, like tidying up or folding laundry. articles.title: The Accidental Engineer Who Conjured Up Extended Reality
articles.summary: In the 1980s, people weren’t wearing head-mounted cameras, displays, or computers. articles.title: The 60-Year Old Algorithm Underlying Today’s Tech
articles.summary: CT scanning, streaming videos, and sending images over the Internet wouldn’t be possible without the Fast Fourier transform. articles.title: Teens’ Innovations Save Marine Life and Better Detect Diseases
articles.summary: Coral reefs are vital to marine ecosystems, supporting more species than any other ocean environment.
